basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Salmonella, Bacillus cereus, Bacillus megaterium, Lactobacillus casei, Leptostylus viridescens, Myotis flavus, Corynebacterium glutamicum, Corynebacterium crenatum, Leuconostoc mesenteroides, Enterococcus faecalis, Shigella flexneri, Staphylococcus aureus and Bacillus thuringiensis.
